Class AbstractGameConnectionClient

java.lang.Object
tage.networking.AbstractGameConnection
tage.networking.client.AbstractGameConnectionClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
IGameConnectionClient, IGameConnection
Direct Known Subclasses:
GameConnectionClient
public abstract class AbstractGameConnectionClient extends AbstractGameConnection implements IGameConnectionClient
Abstract class to define the protected methods necessary for a game connection client.
Author:
Kyle Matz Modified from the SAGE Networking package for the RAGE game engine by Juan E. Ruiz. Ported to TAGE by Scott Gordon.
